overview_of_class: This course will explore classical discussions of the art of rhetoric as they can be applied to perennial problems regarding the role of speech in a democratic society.
name: Rhetoric, Democracy & Empire in Classical Athens
title: SoC COMM_ST 310-0-1 Rhetoric, Democracy & Empire in Classical Athens
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Sophomores, Juniors, and Seniors from every undergraduate school only.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course will explore classical discussions of the art of rhetoric as they can be applied to perennial problems regarding the role of speech in a democratic society.

descriptions.value: Textbook information English translations of Plato, Gorgias; Aristotle, On Rhetoric; Thucydides, History of the Peloponnesian War; Aristophanes, Lysistrata
